attributes.action: Pay extra for all healthcare professionals dealing with Covid 19
attributes.additional_details:
Healthcare professionals never get recognition or adequate pay for what they do to the community. They are risking everything for the community and they should get deserved recognition by paying extra for their service.
In this critical situation of this pandemic, it’s going to be the best thing govt can do to support public health workers.
attributes.background: Healthcare workers risk their and their families lives  to support the community and if they get ill from work, they should get compensation, not just the sick pay.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
